definitions.definition: A female superior or governess of a nunnery , or convent of nuns, having the same authority over the nuns which the abbots have over the monks.
examples: The abbess was always after the nuns to keep the convent immaculately clean.

definitions.definition: A woman who runs a brothel ; a woman employed by a prostitute to find clients .

main_definition: A female superior or governess of a nunnery , or convent of nuns, having the same authority over the nuns which the abbots have over the monks. [First attested around 1150 to 1350]
secondary_definitions: ( archaic , British slang ) A woman who runs a brothel ; a woman employed by a prostitute to find clients .
